text:
Q: Why do you use outflow TX, not inflow TX?

A: For ETH, we only label exchange hot wallets, not each user wallets for deposit. Inflow TXs are flows from user wallets to hot wallets. Outflow is more accurate to see user activeness because hot wallets make user withdrawals.

This is NOT an internal transfer.

Low funding (<0.02%) = bullish

Very low funding (<0%) = very bullish
